about_the_game:
Breathless Hope is a first-person horror and action game set in a peripheral area forgotten by the government and completely isolated after a deadly outbreak.

Survive and help your neighbors

Within the blockade, you’ll have to survive on your own. Most of your neighbors are either infected or locked inside their homes.

Every decision matters

Make tough choices that will shape the storyline. Would you help a neighbor who wronged you in the past? Your choices matter and could mean the difference between life and death.

Don't lose your breath

Run for your life, avoid getting caught, and show no mercy – because the monsters you face certainly won't. When tired, stop and rest – or take an energy drink – otherwise, you’ll become easy prey.

Explore

Explore dark alleys in search of supplies to help others and yourself. But be cautious when turning a corner, as something may be lurking.

Remember: In this game, haste is the enemy of survival.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of explicit violence and gore.

short_description: A bloody outbreak strikes a poor neighborhood. Isolated by the government, residents are left to fend for themselves as ravenous monsters roam the narrow streets. Survive this first-person horror action game, making choices that can mean the difference between life and death.
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
